org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics

Class StatisticsRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.statistics.StatisticsRegistry

  • public class StatisticsRegistry
extends Object
    Singleton registry for all supported statistics. Statistics can be added to the system using StatisticsRegistrySPI.

        Get registered field statistics that are compatible with the the provided type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to get compatible statistics for
        fieldName - the field to get compatible statistics for
